oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 1953 Dodge radio show hosted by George Morgan -- 1953 Dodge radio show hosted by Tommy Sosebee
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two 1953 Dodge radio programs; the first featuring George Morgan, the second featuring Tommy Sosebee with the Beasley Sisters, Dottie (possibly Dottie Dillard, unconfirmed), Owen Bradley, and the Dodge Quintet.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Tommy Sosebee; Owen Bradley; Beasley Sisters; Dodge Quintet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Dodge theme (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (George Morgan) -- Kentucky Means Paradise (George Morgan) -- Dodge commercial (George Morgan) -- Dodge theme (George Morgan) -- Cry Baby Heart (George Morgan) -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Dodge theme -- Dodge theme (Tommy Sosebee, The Beasley Sisters) -- Opening statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- All Night Boogie (Tommy Sosebee) -- Dodge commercial (Tommy Soseby, Dottie [?]) -- Dodge theme (Tommy Sosebee, The Beasley Sisters) -- A Petal From A Faded Rose (Tommy Sosebee, The Beasley Sisters) -- Closing statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- Dodge theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dodge automobile; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Sosebee, Tommy; Beasley Sisters; Bradley, Owen
